aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the tags that are passed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the tags associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access based on the tag keys that are passed in the request

groundstation:ConfigId.description: Filters access by the ID of a config

groundstation:ConfigType.description: Filters access by the type of a config

groundstation:ContactId.description: Filters access by the ID of a contact

groundstation:DataflowEndpointGroupId.description: Filters access by the ID of a dataflow endpoint group

groundstation:GroundStationId.description: Filters access by the ID of a ground station

groundstation:MissionProfileId.description: Filters access by the ID of a mission profile

groundstation:SatelliteId.description: Filters access by the ID of a satellite
